title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days (Portlaoise) (2) Order 2022 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on 27th April 2022
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day (portlaoise) (2) order 2022 (b) order shall come operation 27th april 2022

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

the substitution at reference number 138 for the matter in column 
(4) of the following: 

“Portlaoise –First, second and third Tuesday in each month. First, 
second, third and fourth Thursday in each month. Third and 
fourth Friday in each month. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”, and
text_norm: 2 first schedule district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended - (a) substitution reference number 138 matter column (4) following portlaoise -first second third tuesday month first second third fourth thursday month third fourth friday month sitting 10.30 a.m

text_raw:
3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 

5 of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

the substitution at reference number 122 for the matter in column 
(4) of the following: 

“Portlaoise –First, second and third Tuesday in each month. First, 
second, third and fourth Thursday in each month. Third and 
fourth Friday in each month. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”, and
text_norm: 3 second schedule district court (areas) order 1961 (s.i no 5 1961) hereby amended - (a) substitution reference number 122 matter column (4) following portlaoise -first second third tuesday month first second third fourth thursday month third fourth friday month sitting 10.30 a.m

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [188] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
 20 April 2022 

PAUL KELLY, 
 Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 

documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MAURA HOWE, 
 Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to 
section 10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [188]
